statements: SELECT * FROM LoanPerformanceReports WHERE loan_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, interest_rate FROM LoanPerformanceReports WHERE repayment_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM LoanPerformanceReports WHERE interest_rate >= 3.5 ORDER BY repayment_date DESC;
SELECT loan_amount, interest_rate FROM LoanPerformanceReports WHERE loan_amount < 50000 AND interest_rate < 4;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_loans FROM LoanPerformanceReports;
SELECT * FROM LoanPerformanceReports WHERE repayment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY interest_rate DESC;
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount FROM LoanPerformanceReports WHERE loan_amount > 10000 ORDER BY repayment_date ASC;
SELECT loan_id, interest_rate FROM LoanPerformanceReports WHERE repayment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT AVG(loan_amount) AS average_loan_amount, MAX(interest_rate) AS max_interest_rate FROM LoanPerformanceReports;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_loans, SUM(loan_amount) AS total_loan_amount FROM LoanPerformanceReports WHERE interest_rate < 5.0;
SELECT * FROM Loans;
SELECT id, borrower_id, loan_amount FROM Loans;
SELECT loan_start_date, loan_end_date FROM Loans WHERE borrower_id = 123;
SELECT loan_amount, loan_start_date FROM Loans WHERE loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT DISTINCT borrower_id FROM Loans;
SELECT * FROM Loans WHERE loan_amount > 5000 ORDER BY loan_start_date DESC;
SELECT id, loan_amount FROM Loans WHERE loan_start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT borrower_id, SUM(loan_amount) AS total_loans FROM Loans GROUP BY borrower_id HAVING total_loans > 10000;
SELECT * FROM Loans INNER JOIN Reports ON Loans.id = Reports.loan_id WHERE Loans.loan_amount >= 5000;
SELECT borrower_id, AVG(loan_amount) AS avg_loan_amount FROM Loans GROUP BY borrower_id ORDER BY avg_loan_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM loan_performance_reports
SELECT loan_id, payment_date, payment_amount FROM loan_performance_reports WHERE interest_rate > 3.5
SELECT investor_name, investment_amount FROM investor_reports ORDER BY investment_amount DESC
SELECT AVG(net_profit) AS average_profit FROM profitability_reports
SELECT * FROM loan_performance_reports LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM loan_performance_reports ORDER BY payment_date DESC, loan_amount ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT loan_id, payment_date, payment_amount FROM loan_performance_reports WHERE interest_rate >= 3.5
SELECT * FROM investor_reports WHERE investment_amount > 5000 ORDER BY investor_name ASC
SELECT report_date, net_profit FROM profitability_reports WHERE profit_margin < 20 ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, payment_amount, interest_rate FROM loan_performance_reports WHERE payment_amount > 1000 AND interest_rate < 4.0 ORDER BY loan_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM loans;
SELECT loan_id, borrower, loan_amount FROM loans WHERE loan_status = 'approved';
SELECT borrower, loan_amount, interest_rate FROM loans ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT loan_id, borrower, loan_amount, interest_rate FROM loans WHERE loan_amount > 5000 AND interest_rate < 5.0;
SELECT loan_id, borrower, loan_amount, loan_status FROM loans WHERE loan_status IN ('approved', 'pending') ORDER BY borrower ASC;
SELECT * FROM loans WHERE loan_status='Approved';
SELECT loan_id, borrower FROM loans ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT loan_id, payment_amount FROM payments JOIN loans ON payments.loan_id = loans.loan_id WHERE loan_status='Approved';
SELECT report_id, report_type FROM reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM loan_accounts ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, interest_rate FROM loan_accounts WHERE loan_amount > 10000;
SELECT borrower_id, SUM(loan_amount) AS total_loan_amount FROM loan_accounts GROUP BY borrower_id;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT name, investment_amount FROM investors WHERE investment_date < '2022-03-01';
SELECT * FROM loan_accounts ORDER BY loan_amount DESC, start_date ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT borrower_id, SUM(loan_amount) AS total_loan_amount FROM loan_accounts GROUP BY borrower_id
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 AND late_fee >= 50 ORDER BY payment_date DESC
SELECT name, investment_amount, investment_date FROM investors ORDER BY investment_amount DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT report_date, report_type, content FROM reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' AND report_type = 'Financial' ORDER BY report_date ASC
